name: Crazy Haircut
description:
Looking for a new haircut? Want to run your own hair salon or barber shop? Look no more! Welcome to Crazy Haircut! Relax and enjoy countless hours of fun while you cut insane hairstyles.

GAME FEATURES

*Give clients the hairstyle they want
Customers will give pictures to guide you. All you have to do is slide your finger to follow the lines and concentrate as you cut to give them the haircut of their dreams.

*Keep your customers happy
Keep your customers happy by giving them the perfect haircut. They just might give you a big tip if you do! But be very careful - one wrong snip may make them angry!

*Run multiple salons
Be a hair cutting tycoon and open salons across different locations

*Use the best tools
Upgrade your trimmer to make sure you give only the best hairdos

Crazy Haircut is sure to remove your boredom. Watch and enjoy the satisfying sight of falling hair and happy customers. Ready, set, cut!
